sub_subject.name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
sub_subject.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order) (Science & Nature)

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.objective_text: Identify mammals, birds, and fish.
